body.p: You always work with a selection of entries: both when learning and editiong entries.
The selection screen allows to make a selection based on the status, last learned, score, unit, category and entry type of the entries. The selection is made by pressing the Apply Selection button.

In the status bar at the buttom of the application window the number of currently chosen entries is shown: 19 out of a total of 25 entries (i.e. 6 out of 25 members of the European Union are not member of NATO).

figure.alt: screenshot of DingsBums?! showing the screen to make selections

body.note: You can influence how the selection is preserved or not after changing an entry in the Preferences.
